sentences.en: &B{further to your letter} of 10.10.96, I enclose some correspondence from my previous addresses.
sentences.cn: 有关你在96年10月10日来信中所述之事，我随信附上我从先前几个地址所收发的一些信件。

sentences.en: After a further four-month extension of her probation period, she was sacked.
sentences.cn: 在又试用了4个月后，她被开除了。

sentences.en: All flights to Lanchow had been cancelled until further notice.
sentences.cn: 所有飞往兰州的航班都已取消，何时恢复另行通知。

sentences.en: As the baby suckles, a further supply of milk is generated.
sentences.cn: 婴儿吮吸时，会有更多的奶水流出来。

sentences.en: Buyers might require further assurances before parting with their cash.
sentences.cn: 买方在付现之前可能要求提供进一步的担保。

sentences.en: Education needn't only be about furthering your career.
sentences.cn: 教育不必只是与推进你的事业有关。

sentences.en: He came to a halt at a crossroads fifty yards further on.
sentences.cn: 他在往前50码远的十字路口停了下来。

sentences.en: He dedicated his life to furthering the cause of world peace.
sentences.cn: 他一生致力于推动世界和平事业。

sentences.en: He went even further in his speech to the conference.
sentences.cn: 他在大会发言中作了更进一步的阐述。

sentences.en: His hands moved further down her back.
sentences.cn: 他的手在她背上继续往下滑。

sentences.en: His style could scarcely be further removed from that of his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他的风格几乎和他的前辈如出一辙。

sentences.en: Mr King seems certain to be pressed for further details.
sentences.cn: 看来人们一定会竭力要求金先生提供进一步的细节。

sentences.en: Now we live further away from the city centre.
sentences.cn: 现在我们住得离市中心更远了。

sentences.en: She retained a number of copies for further annotation.
sentences.cn: 她保留了许多副本以便作进一步的注解。

sentences.en: The company intends to squeeze further savings from its suppliers.
sentences.cn: 公司试图从供货商那里再省下一笔费用。

sentences.en: The home side rubbed in their superiority with a further goal.
sentences.cn: 主队再进一球从而奠定了优势。

sentences.en: the museum is closed to the public until further notice.
sentences.cn: 在另行通知之前，博物馆不对外开放。

sentences.en: The police do not propose to take the matter further .
sentences.cn: 警方不打算进一步追查此事。

sentences.en: The rebel forces simply bypassed Zwedru on their way further south.
sentences.cn: 叛军在向南部挺进时直接绕过了绥德鲁。

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: They believed there were likely to be further attacks.
sentences.cn: 他们认为很可能会有更多的袭击。

sentences.en: They walked a little further.
sentences.cn: 他们又往前走了一点。

sentences.en: they were to be kept in prison until further orders.
sentences.cn: 在另有指示之前，他们将被关在监狱里。

sentences.en: They’ve never been further south than San Diego.
sentences.cn: 他们从没有到过比圣迭戈更往南的地方。

sentences.en: Your encouragement will stimulate me to further efforts.
sentences.cn: 你的鼓励会激发我进一步努力。

phrases.tran_cn: 进一步信息；更多的信息；补充信息
延伸阅读；补充书目；进一步的阅读
进一步研究；深造；继续教育，进修
(正式)［用在信件的开头或谈话中，提出以前在信件、文章或交谈中谈论过的事］有关在…中谈到的事情
进一步做；进一步说；更多地给
在另行通知之前（情况不变）
在另有指示之前（情况不变）
没有再费周折；立即；干脆痛快

trans.tran_cn: （空间距离）较/更远地，(时间上)更(早或晚)，更极端地，(发展中)进一步地，在更大程度上，而且
trans.tran_en: a greater distance, or beyond a particular place
to help something progress or be successful
